TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ServicePointManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理 对象集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用于创建、 维护和删除的实例的静态类类。 is a static class used to create, maintain, and delete instances of the class. 当应用程序请求对 Internet 资源统一资源标识符 (URI) 的连接通过对象，返回对象，其中包含的主机和标识方案的连接信息通过 URI。When an application requests a connection to an Internet resource Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) through the object, the returns a object that contains connection information for the host and scheme identified by the URI. 如果已存在对象为该主机和方案，请对象返回现有对象; 否则为对象创建一个新对象。If there is an existing object for that host and scheme, the object returns the existing object; otherwise, the object creates a new object. .NET Framework 4.6 包括一个新的安全功能，将阻止不安全的密码和哈希算法的连接。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 如使用 TLS/SSL 通过 Api 的应用程序， ， ， ，等和面向.NET Framework 4.6 默认情况下获得更安全的行为。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as , , , , , etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 开发人员可能想要选择退出此行为以维护带 RC4 服务使用其现有 SSL3 服务或 TLS 互操作性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services or TLS w/ RC4 services. [这篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)介绍了如何修改你的代码，以便禁用新行为。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建以便连接到 URI www.contoso.com 的对象。The following code example creates a object for connections to the URI www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServicePoint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePoint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器证书的策略。

span.span: Gets or sets policy for server certificates.

value.span: 一个实现 接口的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为接口对象对象使用该实例而不是默认证书策略中定义的证书策略。When the property is set to an interface object, the object uses the certificate policy defined in that instance instead of the default certificate policy. 默认证书策略允许有效的证书和有效的证书已过期。The default certificate policy allows valid certificates and valid certificates that have expired. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获自定义证书策略的证书策略异常。The following code example shows how to catch a certificate policy exception for a custom certificate policy. 它假定已定义证书策略对象、 Web 资源的统一资源标识符 (URI) 包含在变量`myUri`，并且是否有一个名为方法`ProcessResponse`执行应用程序的工作。It assumes that the certificate policy object has been defined, that the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the Web resource is contained in the variable `myUri`, and that there is a method named `ProcessResponse` that performs the work of the application. [!code-cpp[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic ServicePointManager.CertificatePolicy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示是否根据证书颁发机构吊销列表检查证书。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list.

value.span: 如果检查证书吊销列表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`true`，根据证书颁发机构吊销列表中，证书验证过程的一部分检查证书。When the is `true`, the certificate is checked against the certificate authority revocation list, as part of the certificate validation process. 其默认值是`false`。Its default value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. summary.span: 获取或设置 对象所允许的最大并发连接数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections allowed by a object.

value.span: 对象允许的最大并发连接数。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent connections allowed by a object.

value.span: 默认连接限制为 10 中的 ASP.NET 借宿应用程序和对所有其他人的 2。

span.span: The default connection limit is 10 for ASP.NET hosted applications and 2 for all others.

value.span: 应用作为 ASP.NET 主机运行时，如果 autoConfig 属性设置为 ，则无法通过配置文件更改此属性的值。

span.span: When an app is running as an ASP.NET host, it is not possible to alter the value of this property through the config file if the autoConfig property is set to .

value.span: 但是，当 autoConfig 属性设置为 时，可以按编程方式更改值。

span.span: However, you can change the value programmatically when the autoConfig property is .

value.span: 当 AppDomain 加载时，设置一次首选值。

span.span: Set your preferred value once, when the AppDomain loads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置的默认最大并发连接数对象将分配给属性时创建对象。The property sets the default maximum number of concurrent connections that the object assigns to the property when creating objects. 更改属性具有不会影响现有对象; 它只影响初始化在更改后的对象。Changing the property has no effect on existing objects; it affects only objects that are initialized after the change. 如果尚未设置此属性的值，直接或通过配置，则该值默认为该常量。If the value of this property has not been set either directly or through configuration, the value defaults to the constant . > [!NOTE] > 对任何更改属性将影响 HTTP 1.0 和 HTTP 1.1 连接。Any changes to the property affect both HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 connections. 不能单独更改 HTTP 1.0 和 HTTP 1.1 协议的连接限制。It is not possible to separately alter the connection limit for HTTP 1.0 and HTTP 1.1 protocols. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

span.span: is less than or equal to 0.

permission.span: 为无限制的 Web 权限。

span.span: for unrestricted Web permissions.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示域名服务 (DNS) 解析多长时间内视为有效。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a Domain Name Service (DNS) resolution is considered valid.

value.span: 超时值（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The time-out value, in milliseconds.

value.span: 值 -1 指示超时期限无限。

span.span: A value of -1 indicates an infinite time-out period.

value.span: 默认值是 120,000 毫秒（2 分钟）。

span.span: The default value is 120,000 milliseconds (two minutes).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示域名服务 (DNS) 解析是否在多个适用的 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址之间轮流进行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a Domain Name Service (DNS) resolution rotates among the applicable Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.

value.span: 如果 DNS 解析总是返回特定主机的第一个 IP 地址，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if a DNS resolution always returns the first IP address for a particular host; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多个 IP 地址与主机名关联时，DNS 解析通常返回仅为第一个 IP 地址。When more than one IP address is associated with a host name, a DNS resolution normally returns only the first IP address. 如果此属性设置为`true`，则后续的 DNS 解析将在特定主机的所有可用的 IP 地址之间进行循环。If you set this property to `true`, then subsequent DNS resolutions will cycle through all available IP addresses for a particular host. 如果服务使用 DNS 作为负载平衡服务器或服务器群集之间的机制，此选项非常有用。This option is useful when a service uses DNS as a load balancing mechanism between servers or server clusters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/cpp/servicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/CS/servicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePointWhidbey/VB/servicepoint.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取此 实例的 。

span.span: Gets the for this instance.

value.span: 用于此 实例的加密策略。

span.span: The encryption policy to use for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在配置文件中，不指定值属性的默认值为。If a value is not specified in the configuration file, the property defaults to . 这应用于此的 SSL/TLS 会话实例。This is applied to an SSL/TLS session on this instance. 加密策略设置为时需要使用 Null 密码。The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Expect100Continue { get; set; }
.property bool Expect100Continue
Public Shared Property Expect100Continue As Boolean
public: static property bool Expect100Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Expect100Continue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值确定是否使用 100-Continue 行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.

value.span: 若要启用 100-Continue 行为，则为 。

span.span: to enable 100-Continue behavior.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`、 100-继续使用行为。When this property is set to `true`, 100-Continue behavior is used. 客户端请求使用`PUT`并`POST`如果方法会将 Expect 标头添加到请求属性是`true`并属性是大于零或属性为 true。Client requests that use the `PUT` and `POST` methods will add an Expect header to the request if the property is `true` and property is greater than zero or the property is true. 客户端希望接收 100-继续响应的服务器，用于指示客户端应发送要发布的数据。The client will expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted. 此机制允许客户端以避免通过网络发送大量数据时的服务器，根据请求标头，想要拒绝此请求。This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request. 例如，假设属性是`false`。For example, assume the property is `false`. 当请求发送到服务器时，它包含的数据。When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data. 如果之后读取的请求标头，服务器需要身份验证，并且必须发送 401 响应，客户端必须重新发送具有正确的身份验证标头的数据。If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and must send a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers. 如果此属性为`true`，请求标头发送到服务器。If this property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server. 如果服务器不拒绝请求，则会发送一个 100-继续响应信号可以传输数据。If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted. 如果在上述示例中，服务器需要身份验证，将它发送 401 响应，客户端没有不必要地传输数据。If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data. 更改此属性的值不影响现有对象。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing objects. 仅新会影响在更改后创建的对象。Only new objects created after the change are affected. 100-继续行为不使用的 HTTP 1.0 请求，即使此属性设置为`true`。The 100-Continue behavior is not used for HTTP 1.0 requests even if this property is set to `true`. Expect 100-继续在 IETF RFC 2616 部分 10.1.1 完全介绍行为。The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的最大空闲时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum idle time of a object.

value.span: 对象的最大空闲时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The maximum idle time, in milliseconds, of a object.
The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置的最长空闲时间对象将分配给属性时创建对象。The property sets the maximum idle time that the object assigns to the property when creating objects. 为此值的更改只会影响后更改的值初始化的对象。Changes to this value affect only objects that are initialized after the value is changed. 之后对象中指定的时间已处于空闲状态，它是可以进行垃圾回收。After a object has been idle for the time specified in , it is eligible for garbage collection. 一个对象处于空闲状态时与关联的连接列表对象为空。A object is idle when the list of connections associated with the object is empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#8)]

span.span: The default value is 0, which means there is no limit to the number of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时减少低于的数字属性对象中是否存在，当前删除具有最长空闲时间的对象。When you reduce the property below the number of objects currently in existence, the deletes the objects with the longest idle times. 如果数连接为活动状态的对象是否大于的值，则对象删除对象进入空闲状态。If the number of objects with active connections is greater than the value of , the object deletes the objects as they become idle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. summary.span: 将此属性值设置为 会导致来自 HttpWebRequest 的所有出站 TCP 连接对套接字使用本机套接字选项 SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT。

span.span: Setting this property value to causes all outbound TCP connections from HttpWebRequest to use the native socket option SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT on the socket.

summary.span: 这使得可以共享基础传出端口。

span.span: This causes the underlying outgoing ports to be shared.

summary.span: 这可用于在短时间内进行大量传出连接并且应用面临耗尽端口风险的情况。

span.span: This is useful for scenarios where a large number of outgoing connections are made in a short time, and the app risks running out of ports.

value.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置由 对象管理的 对象所使用的安全协议。

span.span: Gets or sets the security protocol used by the objects managed by the object.

value.span: 枚举中定义的值之一。

span.span: One of the values defined in the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性会选择要用于新的连接; 的安全套接字层 (SSL) 或传输层安全性 (TLS) 协议版本现有连接不会更改。This property selects the version of the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol to use for new connections; existing connections aren't changed. 从.NET Framework 4.7 开始，此属性的默认值是。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.7, the default value of this property is . 这允许.NET Framework 网络 Api 基于（例如 FTP、 HTTP 和 SMTP） 继承的默认安全协议，从操作系统或由系统管理员执行任何自定义配置。This allows .NET Framework networking APIs based on (such as FTP, HTTP, and SMTP) to inherit the default security protocols from the operating system or from any custom configurations performed by a system administrator. 默认情况下，每个版本的 Windows 操作系统上的 SSL/TLS 有关启用协议的信息，请参阅[TLS/SSL (Schannel SSP) 中的协议](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/mt808159.aspx)。For information about which SSL/TLS protocols are enabled by default on each version of the Windows operating system, see [Protocols in TLS/SSL (Schannel SSP)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/mt808159.aspx). 对于.NET framework 4.6.2 的.NET framework 的版本，无默认值为此属性列出。For versions of the .NET Framework through the .NET Framework 4.6.2, no default value is listed for this property. 安全情况不断更改，以及默认协议，保护级别随着时间的推移更改以避免已知的漏洞。The security landscape changes constantly, and default protocols and protection levels are changed over time in order to avoid known weaknesses. 默认值取决于各个计算机配置、 已安装的软件和应用的修补程序。Defaults vary depending on individual machine configuration, installed software, and applied patches. 永远不会隐式取决于你的代码应使用特定的保护级别，或假定默认情况下使用给定的安全级别。Your code should never implicitly depend on using a particular protection level, or on the assumption that a given security level is used by default. 如果您的应用程序依赖于使用特定的安全级别，您必须显式指定该级别，然后检查以确保它在建立的连接上使用实际上是。If your app depends on the use of a particular security level, you must explicitly specify that level and then check to be sure that it is actually in use on the established connection. 此外，你的代码应设计为适应更改支持协议能力很强，这种情况下更改通常都是使用小提前通知以降低新出现的威胁。Further, your code should be designed to be robust in the face of changes to which protocols are supported, as such changes are often made with little advance notice in order to mitigate emerging threats. .NET Framework 4.6 包括一个新的安全功能，将阻止不安全的密码和哈希算法的连接。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 默认情况下，使用 TLS/SSL 通过 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient，SmtpClient、 SslStream 等 Api 和面向.NET Framework 4.6 的应用程序获得更安全的行为。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 开发人员可能想要选择退出此行为以便保持与带 RC4 服务及其现有 SSL3 服务或 TLS 互操作性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services. [这篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)介绍了如何修改你的代码，以便禁用新行为。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.

exception.span: 为设置属性而指定的值不是有效 枚举值。

span.span: The value specified to set the property is not a valid enumeration value.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证服务器证书的回调。

span.span: Gets or sets the callback to validate a server certificate.
A .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以设置属性设置为要用于客户端的服务器证书的自定义验证方法。An application can set the property to a method to use for custom validation by the client of the server certificate. 执行自定义验证时`sender`参数传递给可以是主机字符串名称，或一个派生自(，例如) 具体取决于属性。When doing custom validation, the `sender` parameter passed to the can be a host string name or an object derived from (, for example) depending on the property. 如果不使用自定义验证，证书名称将与用于创建请求的主机名进行比较。When custom validation is not used, the certificate name is compared with the host name used to create the request. 例如，如果传递的参数"https://www.contoso.com/default.html"，默认行为是客户端检查证书针对 www.contoso.com。For example, if was passed a parameter of "https://www.contoso.com/default.html", the default behavior is for the client to check the certificate against www.contoso.com. 尽管多路广播的委托，只能从最后一个执行事件处理程序返回的值被视为具有权威。Despite being a multicast delegate, only the value returned from the last-executed event handler is considered authoritative. 换而言之，可以附加多个代理，并获得来自回调。In other words, you can attach multiple delegates, and they all get a callback from . 每个回调返回一个值，指示该证书已被接受或不;但是，只有最后一个委托的值，则考虑。Each callback returns a value that indicates whether the certificate is accepted or not; however, only the value from the last delegate is respected.

span.span: to set the property.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetTcpKeepAlive (bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
.method public static hidebysig void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int32 keepAliveTime, int32 keepAliveInterval) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetTcpKeepAlive (enabled As Boolean, keepAliveTime As Integer, keepAliveInterval As Integer)
public: static void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
static member SetTcpKeepAlive : bool * int * int -> unit

param.name: enabled
param.span: 如果设置为 true，则使用指定的 keepAliveTime 和 keepAliveInterval 值启用 TCP 连接上的 TCP keep-alive 选项。

span.span: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified keepAliveTime and keepAliveInterval values.

param.span: 如果设置为 false，则将禁用 TCP keep-alive 选项，并忽略剩余参数。

span.span: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
The default value is false.

param.name: keepAliveTime
param.span: 指定发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动的超时时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 指定当未收到确认消息时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

summary.span: 对 TCP 连接启用或禁用 keep-alive 选项。

span.span: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以请求 TCP/IP 提供程序允许使用 TCP 连接上保持活动数据包。An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection. 默认为使用 TCP 连接上保持活动数据包已禁用。The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled. TCP 套接字时的默认设置初始化到 2 小时的设置保持活动超时和保持活动状态的时间间隔为 1 秒。The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second. `keepAliveTime`参数指定的超时，以毫秒为单位，在发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动。The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent. `keepAliveInterval`参数指定的间隔，以毫秒为单位，介于时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包如果没有收到确认。The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. 保持活动状态的探测数不能更改，并设置为 10。The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10. 如果 TCP 连接删除 keep-alive，因此的套接字，返回到正在进行中的任何调用，并且任何后续调用将失败并的。If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a of is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a of .

exception.span: 为 或 参数指定的值小于等于 0.

span.span: The value specified for or parameter is less than or equal to 0.

summary.span: 确定由此 对象管理的服务点是否使用 Nagle 算法。

span.span: Determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used by the service points managed by this object.

value.span: 如果使用 Nagle 算法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Nagle 算法来减少网络流量通过缓冲的数据的小型数据包，将它们传输作为单个数据包。The Nagle algorithm is used to reduce network traffic by buffering small packets of data and transmitting them as a single packet. 此过程也称为"nagling";它被广泛使用，因为它可减少传输的数据包数量，并降低了每个数据包的开销。This process is also referred to as "nagling"; it is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet. 更改此属性的值不影响现有对象。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing objects. 仅服务创建新点在更改后会受到影响。Only new service points created after the change are affected. 在 IETF RFC 896 完全描述 Nagle 算法。The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#10)]
